entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy and ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h becoming west 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
